channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold steadies, bitcoin plunges as debasement trade rally comes to a halt
New York attorney general urges public to report ICE activity after raid targets vendors
Orange Cats Are Genetically Different From All Other Mammals, According to a New Study
After Trump Just Threatened To Cut Medicare, Medicaid, And Social Security, Here's How Americans Are Reacting
Cohoes man admits his dogs killed Schenectady man in brutal mauling
What to know about redistricting efforts across US at Trump’s prodding
White House plans to demolish entire East Wing as ballroom cost hits $300 million
item.description: The Trump administration is planning to demolish the entirety of the White House's East Wing by this weekend, two senior administration officials said...

item.title: Trump hits Russian oil companies with long-threatened sanctions: 'It was time'
item.description: The Treasury Department said new economic penalties will target Russia’s two largest oil companies, Rosneft and Lukoil, as well as their subsidiaries.

item.title: University of Virginia strikes deal to pause Trump administration investigations
item.description: The U.S. Justice Department has announced an agreement with the University of Virginia to pause civil rights investigations.

item.title: U.S. debt tops $38 trillion for first time, worsened by government shutdown
item.description: The national debt is rising faster than ever and threatens to undermine confidence in the economy, experts warn.

item.title: Mom arrested after leaving baby girl at New York subway station
item.description: The mother of a newborn baby found at a Midtown Manhattan subway station has been taken into custody in Queens, law enforcement sources said.

item.title: Russell Vought's push to reshape the government
item.description: At the start of the government shutdown, President Trump posted a video that referred to Russ Vought, head of the White House's Office of Management a...

item.title: With Supreme Court ruling still pending, judge extends block on Guard in Chicago indefinitely
Entire East Wing expected to be demolished as soon as this weekend: Sources
item.description: The White House is expected to demolish the entire East Wing to allow for construction of President Trump’s ballroom, sources familiar with the projec...

item.title: Furloughed federal workers turn to food bank during government shutdown
item.description: The ongoing government shutdown is now the second-longest in U.S. history, and furloughed federal workers are feeling the real-world impacts. CBS News...

item.title: WATCH: Parents of Israeli hostage killed by Hamas waiting for his body to be returned
item.description: Omer Neutra from New York state is one of two deceased American Israeli hostages whose bodies have still not been returned by Hamas.

item.title: Takeaways from Trump meeting with NATO chief over Russia-Ukraine war
item.description: President Trump hosted NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte at the White House on Wednesday to discuss what's next for Ukraine. CBS News White House repo...

item.title: WATCH: Parkinson's disease patient plays clarinet during brain surgery
item.description: A patient undergoing brain surgery plays the clarinet, allowing surgeons to instantly hear the impacts of the treatment.
